ygData.subject: Fw: [eqbards] Cazic Thule AOF advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Good idea.  But, you d probably have to move your camp into the bubble room to make this feasible, unless you re always extremelly ready for the AOF to spawn.
ygData.messageBody:
Good idea. But, you'd probably have to move your camp into the bubble room
to make this feasible, unless you're always extremelly ready for the AOF to
spawn. This will cut into your potential exp, as will moving into the AOF
room if you don't want to risk something spawning on top of you. I
typically try to pick areas to squat where the fewest mobs possible will
attack on spawn. Bubble room isn't one of them, a lesson I learned the very
first time we tried to tackle him.

The idea about the Cleric taking the HT is a good idea also. Unfortunately,
Clerics tend to pick guk as their stomping grounds when they're AOF capable.
:)

I was also corrected by my GF (said mage in all my groups) that the message
you receive is "Not a valid target" when you try to /pet attack the AOF when
he's in the bubble. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony

by just sitting there, and it
